MAX11644.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 # -----------------------------------------------------------
2 # Library to control MAX11644 device
3 #
4 # (C) 2021 Christopher Sanchez, Lille, France
5 # Released under XX License
6 # email c.sanchez@niryo.com
7 # ---
8 
9 from smbus2 import SMBus
10 import time
11 
12 __version__ = "1.1.0-auto.0"
13 # Internal constants:
14 _DEFAULT_ADDRESS = 0x36
15 _DEFAULT_BUS = 1
16 _V_REF_INTERNAL = 4.096
17 _VDD = 5.0
18 
19 """
20  MAX11644 is 12-bit analog to digital converter.
21  :param int bus: The channel number if it's different to 1.
22  :param int address: The address of the device if set differently from the default
23  :param bool internal_reference: External or internal voltage reference boolean (True, False if you want to use VDD
24  as reference)
25 """
26 
27 
28 class MAX11644(object):
29  def __init__(self, bus=_DEFAULT_BUS, address=_DEFAULT_ADDRESS, internal_reference=True,
30  v_ref_internal=_V_REF_INTERNAL):
31  # I2C bus object
32  self._i2c = SMBus(bus)
33  # added to avoid communication problems
34  time.sleep(1)
35  self._address = address
36  self._bus = bus
37  self._SETUP = 0x80
38  self._CONF = 0x00
39 
40  if internal_reference:
41  self._SETUP = 0xD0
42  self._ref_volt = v_ref_internal
43  else:
44  self._SETUP = 0x82
45  self._ref_volt = _VDD
46 
47  self._SETUP = (self._SETUP | 0x02) # internal clock, unipolar, no action
48  self._send_data_(self._SETUP)
49 
50  def __str__(self):
51  return 'MAX11644, bus {}, address {}'.format(self._bus, self._address)
52 
53  @property
54  def address(self):
55  return self._address
56 
57  @property
58  def bus(self):
59  return self._bus
60 
61  def _send_data_(self, byte):
62  """Send a byte to device"""
63  self._i2c.write_byte(self._address, byte)
64  time.sleep(0.1)
65 
66  def _read_data(self, address):
67  """Read 2 bytes from address address."""
68  data = self._i2c.read_i2c_block_data(self._address, address, 2)
69  return data
70 
71  def get_value(self, channel=0):
72  """Get Full scale value (12 bits)"""
73  if channel == 0:
74  self._CONF = 0x61
75  data = self._read_data(self._CONF)
76 
77  elif channel == 1:
78  self._CONF = 0x63
79  data = self._read_data(self._CONF)
80  else:
81  raise Exception("Channel doesn't exist")
82  data = ((data[0] & 0x0F) << 8) | data[1]
83  return data
84 
85  def convert_to_volt(self, value):
86  """Convert Full scale value (12 bits) into volts"""
87  return self._ref_volt * value / 4096.
88 
89  def get_voltage(self, channel=0, factor=1):
90  return self.convert_to_volt(self.get_value(channel) / factor)
